DOC.brief_summary: The study design determine extent plant-based ingredient able modulate blood glucose response administer meal .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female , age start study ≥ 18 ≤ 50 year ; Apparently healthy : medical condition might affect study measurement , judge study physician and/or measure questionnaire , and/or assess haematology , blood chemistry urinalysis ; Fasting blood glucose value subject ≥ 3.4 ≤ 6.1 mmol/litre ( i.e . 62110 mg/dl ) screening ; Haemoglobin level within clinically acceptable range ( male 12 17 gm/dL female 11 15 gm/dL ; inclusive ) judge research physician ; Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 18,0 ≤ 25,0 kg/m2 ; Agreeing inform medically relevant personal testresults study physician ; Willing comply study protocol study ; Willing refrain drink alcohol one day blood withdrawal ; Accessible vein arm determine examination screening ; Being literate ; HbA1C ≤ 6.5 % ( 48 mmol/mol ) . Any history diabetes , hyper ( hypo ) glycemia disorder glucose metabolism ; Any history gastrointestinal disorder ( include frequent diarrhoea example ) ; Blood donation past 2 month ; Reported participation another nutritional biomedical trial 3 month prestudy examination study ; Reported participation night shift work two week prior prestudy investigation study . Night work define work 23.00 PM 6.00 AM ; Reported intense sporting activity > 10h/w ; Consumption ≥120 ml alcoholic drink male female typical week ; Drug abuse indicated urine analysis ; Chronic smoker , tobacco chewer drinker ; Use medication , include supplement traditional medicine ; Reported dietary habit , medically prescribed/slimming diet ; Not use eat breakfast ; Reported weight loss/gain ( > 10 % ) last six month study ; Being employee Unilever CRO ; Allergy intolerance food product aversion food product provide study ; If female : pregnant planning pregnancy study period ; If female : lactating lactate 6 week prestudy investigation and/or study period .
